title: Roblox Is Bringing Generative AI to Its Gaming Universe
description: The company aims to draw on the new technology’s code-writing ability to make its digital worlds even more customizable.

title: Google Pioneered Stratospheric Loon Balloons. Was China Watching?
description: The search company helped revolutionize balloon technology to beam internet access to global blank spots. Now, China seems to have lofted a similar project.

title: One Startup’s Plan to Help Africa Lure Back Its AI Talent
description: Lelapa is building a research lab to serve African businesses and nonprofits, with the hope that locally grown algorithms can better serve communities.

title: Bitcoin Miners Are Playing a High-Stakes Game of Chicken
description: In the bitter crypto winter, companies are making deep cuts to survive a new challenge.

title: Germany Raises Red Flags About Palantir’s Big Data Dragnet
description: A court has issued strict limits on how police can pull innocent bystanders into big data investigations.
